<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<symfony>
  <commands namespace="foo">
    <command id="foo:bar" name="foo:bar">
  <usage>foo:bar</usage>
  <description>The foo:bar command</description>
  <help/>
  <aliases>
    <alias>afoobar</alias>
  </aliases>
  <arguments/>
  <options/>
</command>
  </commands>
</symfony>
